question:
Even though globalization has some very positive effects, we cant forget its negative effects.
What are the disadvantages and advantages of globalization?
text: It is undeniable fact that the advancement of technology  has transferred the horizon and platform of working. One of the most prominent is  globalization. In this contemporary era,everyone is aware of different things and from the usage of work. Globalization has many merits as a result one can have the knowledge of many sections but we cannot neglect the demerits of globalization. This essay will further substantiate the advantages and the limitations of globalization.

To initiate with, globalization upsurging nowadays and it is gaining momentum. It strengthens the bond among the people. Everything is so easy today that one can easily find their area of interests and start work according to that field, as a result,they start commuting from one place to another.Consequently,increases the economy of the country. To illustrate, if a person has a delightful contact with some foreign companies it helps proliferating their country finance.

Moving further, there are a plethora of disadvantages of globalization. People are migrating from rural areas to urban areas owing to much rush in the urban cities. For instance, an individual who is doing everything for living but  cannot find a job according to his qualification, as a result, they start commuting. Therefore, they migrate to urban cities thus they have to find a house and proper infrastructure for living.
To summarize, globalization helps a person in many ways but the government should take care of the needs of an individual so that there will be no negative impact occur due to globalization.
